Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 I see go version 1.9 in both fabric, fabric-ca master branches but the go version in baseimage is 1.9.2.. Do you want me to push this change?

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: Ah - yeah - I guess we should update to the latest Go version in CI

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: I agree to update to 1.9.2 across the board, to match the baseimage version 1.9.2.
